                                 asy=="pnAb_id50" ~ "")
          	  res = knitr::knit_child(c(here::here('cor_graphical', 'report_violin_adhoc.Rmd')), quiet = TRUE)
          		cat(res, sep = '\n')
              cat("\\clearpage", sep = '\n')
          	}
      }
    }
  }
